definitions.text: the action of opposing something that you disapprove or disagree with
examples: he encountered a general feeling of resistance from many citizens
despite opposition from the newspapers he went ahead

definitions.text: the act of hostile groups opposing each other
examples: the government was not ready for a confrontation with the unions

definitions.text: a contestant that you are matched against
a body of people united in opposing something
an armed adversary (especially a member of an opposing military force)
examples: a soldier must be prepared to kill his enemies

definitions.text: the major political party opposed to the party in office and prepared to replace it if elected
